sentences.english: And make Tianjin caly figurines is to shine is famous of Zhang's Painted caly figurines.
sentences.chinese: 而使得天津泥塑大放異彩的，是“泥人張”的彩塑。

sentences.english: Clay Sculpture is an old and common folk art in China.
sentences.chinese: 泥塑是中國一種古老常見的民間藝術。

sentences.english: Secondly, Niejiazhuang clay sculpture's production process is closely related to its artistic features.
sentences.chinese: 聶家莊泥塑的藝術特色與其製作工藝息息相關。

sentences.english: Clay sculptures, a kind of folk craft of sculpturing a variety of figures from clay, is also known as "painted sculpture" and "mud play".
sentences.chinese: 泥塑，即用粘土塑製成各種形象的一種民間手工藝。

sentences.english: Fourthly, Niejiazhuang clay sculpture's original business strategies and market positioning must change.
sentences.chinese: 聶家莊泥塑原有的經營策略與市場定位必須轉變。

sentences.english: The Fengxiang folk art is colorful, among which the colored drawing on pottery clay sculpture bears the richest style.
sentences.chinese: 鳳翔民間藝術豐富多彩，以彩繪泥塑最具風格。

sentences.english: Baton of clay painted in red stripes, with imitation mace-head of clay.
sentences.chinese: 泥塑棍棒，表面塗有紅色條紋，頂端是仿狼牙棒頭。

sentences.english: Ding Jiabao clay product marketing more than 20 overseas countries and regions.
sentences.chinese: 丁家堡的泥塑產品行銷海外二十多個國家和地區。

sentences.english: This was the third in the claymation series, with Robbie set to marry his beloved Donner.
sentences.chinese: 這部電影是這個泥塑動畫系列的第三部。

sentences.english: Thirdly, Niejiazhuang clay sculpture yet to face a real crisis of survival.
sentences.chinese: 聶家莊泥塑的生存尚未面臨真正危機。

sentences.english: Only in this way can Xiao Guo clay sculpture be inherited and developed.
sentences.chinese: 這樣小郭泥塑就能得到繼承和發展。

sentences.english: Two clay-sculptured dragons spiralling up the columns seem to fly up with the head high.
sentences.chinese: 兩條盤柱泥塑蟠龍，生動矯健，似欲昂首騰飛。

sentences.english: Wilhelmi is also known for his clay "monster" creatures.
sentences.chinese: Wilhelmi也被稱爲他的泥塑“怪物”的生物。

sentences.english: The Armature is the aluminum skeleton underneath a clay sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 電樞的是下一個泥塑鋁骨架。

sentences.english: Pots and - stand of 4 clay cows.
sentences.chinese: 陶罐若干，站立式四牛泥塑模型一件。

definition: papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
a pottery figurine buried with the dead
